text: 2:15-16 Matyu 25:31; Aposel 10:42; 1 Timoti 1:11; 2 Timoti 2:8; 4:1; 4:8Me amir arazir kamɨn e fo, God Moses Osirizir Arazibar akam men navir averiabar an osirizɨma an azenim girɨ. Dughiar maba men nɨghnɨzimra akam me gasi; egha dughiar maba men nɨghnɨzim ghaze, ia deravɨram ami. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨghnɨzir men navir averiabar aven itir kam uaghan kamaghɨn en aka, Moses Osirizir Araziba guizbangɨra men navir averiabar aven iti.
